item.title: Trump says he will meet with Putin in Alaska on Aug. 15
item.description: Washington's deadline for Moscow to strike a ceasefire in Ukraine was slated to expire on Friday.

item.title: Trump announces peace deal between Azerbaijan and Armenia at White House
item.description: Azerbaijan and Armenia signed a U.S.-brokered peace agreement on Friday during a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump that would boost bilateral e...

item.title: Trump removes IRS boss, Treasury Secretary Bessent takes over for now
item.description: Billy Long, who was sworn in just under two months ago, was already the sixth person to hold the job this year.

item.title: Trumpâ€™s team expands search for Fed chair to about 10 names, WSJ reports
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's team is reviewing new contenders to lead the Federal Reserve once Chair Jerome Powell's term ends in May.

item.title: Trump warns courts against knocking down tariffs, says duties are 'huge positive' for stock market
item.description: The president said a tariff reversal could cause a Great Depression-style economic crisis.
